website_summaries.verdict: You get a lot for your money in this package, which includes everything you need to get started electric violin.
pros: Offered by a reliable company that stands behind the instrument
Great to practice anywhere without making noise
Plug-in jack and general design make this a very easy to use instrument
Includes a mini-amp, case, bow, headphones, rosin, strings, and a polishing cloth
cons: Included strings and bow may not work well for advanced players

customer_reviews.title: Kennedy Violin is Awesome and so is this violin!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this violin for my son who has been playing for about 10 years. He wanted it to play in the pep and jazz bands at his high school. He is very happy with the violin and it sounds great.The the seller (Kennedy Violins) is awesome. We could not get the amp to work, so I contacted the seller who asked us to send them a video of us setting it up and playing. After reviewing our video, the seller replaced the Amp for us at their expense. They were extremely polite and helpful. Obviously a company that understands customer service. I highly recommend this company and the violin. A+++++++
customer_reviews.author: D. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful instrument with nice sound!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made instrument, some trouble with static with the pick-up but it is being reviewed by Kennedy. Bow losing hair but also being reviewed by Kennedy who offered replacement is loss continues. but that does not reflect on the quality of the instrument. I bought the one on clearance and had to look really hard to find the cosmetic defect. Beginners beware that it is a much heavier violin than an acoustic and it takes getting used to the weight. Overall, very satisfied and would buy from Kennedy again!
customer_reviews.author: Anahull

customer_reviews.title: Stays in tune...good for practice
customer_reviews.text: Havent plugged it into real amp yet...Stays in tune...you can hear your playing really good thru the headphones...the bow is fine...it works...the case is good...I am a pro. Musician..but only a novice fiddler..its great to practice and not bug anyone..the little amp is fine for that too..overall..so far so good...a real instrument not a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Knouse

customer_reviews.title: The electronics failed within a month. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The electronics quickly failed. The small amplifier that came with the violin quit working within a week. The headphone jack stopped working after a month and the output jack when used with another amplifier only works sometimes for a short time. I still play the violin even though it doesn't sound like a violin with no amplification because I am determined to learn to play and hopefully someday I will be able to afford a real violin and not this toy violin. My advice is to never purchase a violin online. Go to a music store and actually play the instrument. And realize that when you purchase a cheap violin you get what you paid for. Be forewarned.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great electric violin package
customer_reviews.text: The violin is in excellent condition and everything included was of good quality. The package includes almost everything you need to get started and the support from Kennedy Violins can provide the rest, like help tuning the violin. Highly recommend the violin package if you're looking for a complete set up that will allow you to start playing right away.
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Lister

customer_reviews.title: Great starter pack for first timers
customer_reviews.text: Everything was included and seemed to be great, especially the nice case that It came in. I was sooo excited to try it out but could get amplifier to turn on! Waiting for customer service to call me back! But overall, besides not being able to play it with amp, impressed with this order and recommend it for people new to electric violins.
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Impressively Complete Setup
customer_reviews.text: Everything that was needed to just pick up the instrument and start playing was included in the package. The strings were also pretty close to being accurately in tune, so I know your inspectors had to give it a thorough checkout before shipment. The instrument was well packed and arrived with no problems or damage. The sound for an electric instrument is pretty good, both with the headphones and the 5 watt violin amplifier. The design and finish of the instrument is very attractive. The case and other accessories were also nice. Overall, I think this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Kolivas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing electric violin for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing electric violin for the price! We upgraded the strings and bridge when we got it and it sounds great! The bow is ok. What you would expect, but my daughter has a nicer one. The amp is great for practice in a small room and the headphones work great for private practice. Not quite silent as stated, but for the money this violin package is a GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t be fooled by the good reviews
customer_reviews.text: My teenager daughter was very excited to get this for her birthday, but her enthusiasm quickly turned to bitter disappointment. I can’t understand the good reviews for this cheap piece of crap. The little amp/speaker never worked once. Various strings have snapped on the violin and it is impossible to keep it in tune. The bow is flimsy. We called customer service and got some half-hearted advice to watch YouTube videos to try to fix it ourselves. My daughter never bothers to play it because it is such a pain to work with. The only decent thing about it is the case it came in. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A bit misleading on the speaker it’s very small cheap you’re better off playing acoustic to project the sound we added our own personal speaker and it’s great!! The mini speaker that it comes with does not project good sound quality. Our daughter loves it thow. All that matters. However Outstanding for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY - not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift, thinking it would be of decent quality because of the reviews. It is of moderate quality at best, and the neck of the violin was only partially painted - something that should have easily been spotted by the so called "inspector" - as they put a PASS INSPECTION sticker on the violin. Poor quality, slopped on paint all around, sub-par hardware. Spend a little more and get something worth while.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chang

customer_reviews.title: arrived ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: I decided to use my spare time to learn something new and decided a violin was the way to go! I am very happy with this purchase. I enjoy spending some time each day working on it. The violin arrived when they said it would - was super protected in the packaging - and I was up and running in no time. It sounds great - mind you this is my first violin - but to me the quality is great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She plays violin in the school orchestra, but wanted and electric so she could play in church. She was very impressed with this instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great electric violin!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great elec violin for the price and quality!!! So impressed by the packaging and sound. I customized it and was sooo easy making it look how I wanted, even though it looked awesome the way it came...
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: The turnaround time for shipping was amazing. Great customer service that I got a follow up email from Kennedy Violins letting me know my package was being handled carefully and that they will touch base when I receive it! They did exactly that. It plays really well for the price and is amazing for being in an apartment, I’m not so scare to play too loudly as I can plug headphones in. Sound quality is amazing and it’s in great shape too.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had an issue at first I thought but turns out it's just how they are. Works great! They were super helpful and contacted me right away to solve the problem
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this violin. I am a bignner violinist. I have only been playing off and on for a year. I have a cheap acoustic violin that I started learning on but I needed something that sounds better and a little quieter. This violin delivers.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: output is not working in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it around 3 months ago. At first, I could listen the sound via speaker and headset properly. One month later, I started not working so that I tried to change batteries and cables. During these trials, I missed my return timeline. This one already became a garbage. You should be careful of this product....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: He says that it is everything advertised and even more.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: I like my elec edge violin
customer_reviews.text: I like my elec edge violin, it sounds as good as the amplifier I plug in to. The only problem I found was the 9 VDC battery go's flat fairly quickly. I just added a slid switch in series with my battery and it seems to have made a big difference in battery life. I would still recommend this violin.
customer_reviews.author: golfchix

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It was already on it's way when I saw that they are on clearance because of some kind of blemish. Arrived yesterday and I could not be more pleased. If there is something, I don't see it. This violin is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Ha Na Kyung

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews are true — this fiddle is just what I hoped for. I don’t need a Zeta or Yamaha but I played them and I’m still going with this fiddle. I’m so happy. I have one word: wow! Thank you Kennedy Violins.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: First Electric Violin
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to the world of violins and so having the option to have headphones and not disturb the house was one of the main reasons why I went with an electric violin. Was very impressed with everything that came with the violin and Kennedy's detailed care with the packaging and details. Excited to keep learning!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Blue!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I’m glad I went electric rather than a crappy starter violin. Even after so long it’s still holding up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: kapman

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I ordered through Kennedy Violins as I wanted a company versed in violins. The package came with a check list stating all they reviewed. It arrived quickly and was ready to play . Very light weight compared to regular violin.
customer_reviews.author: CBrew

customer_reviews.title: The violin exceeded my expectations especially the strings and bow ...
customer_reviews.text: The violin exceeded my expectations especially the strings and bow. I was prepared to replace them without inspecting them but do not have to.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product and service
customer_reviews.text: It's exquisite, both the violin and the seller. It came with everything I needed and it plays nicely. If you're looking for an electric violin, this one is a stand out option
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: I chose this product because of positive reviews and was disappointed !
customer_reviews.text: The sounds from G and D strings are cheap . The sounds from A and E strings are OK .
customer_reviews.author: ∑и∂∑Я Щ◊ﾚﾓ

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great though
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thick an uncomfortable. The sound is great though
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: I’m in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!! Excellent from the shipping to the opening of the beautiful case and the amazing violin and all the accessories EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: Very good i love is smooth package has everything done good job thank you
customer_reviews.author: amani ouafaa

customer_reviews.title: I love this violin
customer_reviews.text: I love this violin!! I love the sound and is really easy to play. This is my first electric violin and so far I'm really impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisha Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent item. Very well packaged. Excellent bundle for the price. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: lynda keyes

customer_reviews.title: New to violin!
customer_reviews.text: The violin can in quickly and looks fantastic. It sounds great! I can't wait to learn the play. And since I live in Texas, I'll be fiddlin' away!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ashcraft

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this violin (along with a Stentor II 1500) to play in a country band. I'd played viola in school and tried to play in the past and wanted to fill a need in the band. I had an old broken down instrument that my Dad had played but it was not up to par. The difference in this violin and the Stentor is night and day. The obvious quality of the EDGE, the ease of playing, and the electronics make an experience that is truly enjoying. Now I just have to learn to play it.
customer_reviews.author: L and M Smith

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful beginners violin at a competitive price point!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised with the quality of this “clearance” violin at such an incredible price point. I was a bit worried about the red color initially because I didn’t want it to look like a toy but it looks amazing in person. It is light and easy to get used to straight out of the box. Do not worry about the clearance label as it does not affect any aspect of the violin... the only things I noticed on mine was minor and can be easily overlooked especially as a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got the Bunnel Edge, red electric violin. I am and intermediate/advanced player. This is my first electric violin. Violin sounds great and the package is wonderful! You get all the goodies including case, bow, and rosin etc.. For the price this is well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just received for my 11 year old grand daughter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received for my 11 year old grand daughter and I to play with. Very excited! Took my grand daughter to the Femmes of Rock and once she saw them playing the electric violins she was in awe. I was very excited to get this for both of us.
customer_reviews.author: PT109

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Although we haven't tried it out yet, the violin arrived in 2 days. It was well-packaged and all parts were intact. I was impressed with the quality of the case and instrument, and can't wait to start learning!
customer_reviews.author: T B

customer_reviews.title: Great violin at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got back into playing violin after several years and decided to try an electric violin. I am very pleased with the sound and overall quality of the violin! This is a great start-up kit for beginners that I would recommend to anyone wanting to give the electric violin a try!
customer_reviews.author: GeologyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality electric and acoustic for a student or semi-professional. Nice sound.
customer_reviews.author: Torrsfam

customer_reviews.title: DANK
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this product! Rented it for a youth conference and it looked and sounded amazing! Ran it through a reverb and delay pedal into a DI and it sounded bomb. Also, Zach from Kennedy Violins is the MAN!!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Spadolini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! Saw it at the Oregon Suzuki Institute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
